title: Flight Reservation
description: Collects all details specific to a flight reservation.

xdm:flightReservation.description: Captures all details specific to an individual flight reservation

xdm:agentID.title: Agent ID
xdm:agentID.description: Agent or broker responsible for booking the reservation, if applicable.

xdm:arrivalAirportCode.title: Arrival Airport Code
xdm:arrivalAirportCode.description: Tracks the arrival city airport code.

xdm:departureAirportCode.title: Departure Airport Code
xdm:departureAirportCode.description: Tracks the departure city airport code.

xdm:fareClass.title: Fare Class
xdm:fareClass.description: The fare class of the flight being reserved.

xdm:departureDate.title: Departure Date
xdm:departureDate.description: The departure date of the flight being reserved.

xdm:arrivalDate.title: Arrival Date
xdm:arrivalDate.description: The arrival date of the flight being reserved.

xdm:loyaltyID.title: Loyalty ID
xdm:loyaltyID.description: Includes the loyalty/rewards program ID for the passenger listed in the reservation.

xdm:passenger.title: Passenger
xdm:passenger.description: Passenger info associated with the reservation.

xdm:salesChannel.title: Sales Channel
xdm:salesChannel.description: Sales channel from which the reservation was booked.

xdm:securityScreening.title: Security Screening
xdm:securityScreening.description: Type of security screening the passenger is subject to.

xdm:status.title: Status
xdm:status.description: The status of the flight reservation.
